text: if in the address system normally used
for safety briefings from cabin crew but
on this flight being used by the Pope to

he was asked about the church's

who set the meet up at all I some think

visit to the Philippines Pope Francis
visited a charity that helps street
children in the capital Manila their
parents too poor to look after them and
many having faced begging drugs and
prostitution at a youth event the Pope
heard from a 12 year old former street
child he tearfully asked why God allowed
this to happen when the children were
not at fault these encounters in a
country of 80 million Catholics prompted
the question about contraception on the
Pope's flight home his response was
blunt but restated Catholic teaching
that there are ways to limit family size
allowed by the church but the ban on
